# Pull Request Checklist

## Extension Changes
- [ ] Version bumped in `manifest.json`
- [ ] Permissions documented and justified in `PRIVACY_POLICY.md` and `STORE_LISTING.md`
- [ ] Auto-send/keyboard shortcut behavior matches listing copy

## QA
- [ ] Manual QA run using `QA_CHECKLIST.md`
- [ ] Verified right-click and keyboard shortcut flows on all LLMs
- [ ] Verified auto-send ON/OFF behavior (ChatGPT manual send)

## Store Assets
- [ ] Screenshots updated if UI changed
- [ ] Promo images updated if UI changed
- [ ] Privacy policy URL verified

## Packaging
- [ ] Rebuilt `toss-extension.zip` from extension files only
